title.narrative: Kenya - Routes 2000 : Réhabilitation des routes rurales de district

description.narrative: The project objective is to restore the classified road network to a maintainable condition in eight districts in the Rift Valley Province.

mailing-address.narrative: African Development Bank Group Headquarters Avenue Joseph Anoma 01 BP 1387 Abidjan 01, Côte d'Ivoire
